_notes: This is an example configuration file for make.cs.
Placement: put this file in the same directory as make.cs so it is picked up automatically,
or pass its path explicitly as the single positional argument: dotnet run make.cs -- ./make.json
All properties are optional â€” you can omit any of them and instead use CLI options or rely on defaults.
The '_notes' property is not read by the tool; it is only used here to provide inline documentation.
API keys are never stored here; always pass them via --api-key on the CLI.
project:                    (--project)                        Path to a .csproj file or a directory containing one.
noLogo:                     (--no-logo)                        Suppress the startup logo (default: false).
logoFile:                   (--logo-file)                      Path to a text file containting the startup logo ASCII art.
outputDir:                  (--output-dir)                     Directory where build/pack outputs are placed (default: ./output).
cacheDir:                   (--cache-dir)                      Directory for cache files (default: ./cache).
tempDir:                    (--temp-dir)                       Temporary working directory during pack (default: ./temp).
runtimesVersion:            (--runtimes-version)               Version of runtime assets to include in RID-specific packages.
runtimesUrl:                (--runtimes-url)                   URL or format string for runtime archives, often with {0} placeholder.
runtimesLicenseSpdx:        (--runtimes-license-spdx)          SPDX license expression to apply to RID packages.
runtimesLicenseFileUrl:     (--runtimes-license-file-url)      URL or format string to a license file to include in RID packages.
runtimesLicenseSpdxFileUrl: (--runtimes-license-spdx-file-url) URL or format string to a text file containing an SPDX identifier for RID packages.
nugetSource:                (--nuget-source)                   NuGet feed endpoint for push (default: https://api.nuget.org/v3/index.json).
docfx:                      (--docfx)                          Path to a docfx.json file or a directory containing one.
docsOutput:                 (--docs-output)                    Override the documentation output directory. If omitted, the value from docfx.json is used.
buildBeforeDocs:            (--build-before-docs)              Build the project before running DocFX (useful for binary-based documentation).
requireDocfxMinVersion:     (--require-docfx-min-version)      Minimum required DocFX version (e.g. 2.75.0). Fails if the installed version is older.
